officers.title: President
officers.name: Jack Sovereign
officers.bio: I’m a junior at CSU studying computer science. I’ve had an interest in cybersecurity for years, but never really knew where to learn more about it until I found this club! I’m excited to learn more about it and share my knowledge with others throughout the upcoming year. If I’m not studying, I like hiking, camping, watching movies, and listening to music.
responsibilities: Lead meetings and delegate tasks to officers

officers.title: Vice President
officers.name: Chloe Hesskamp
officers.bio: I am a sophomore undergraduate student at CSU studying computer science and mathematics.  I became interested in cybersecurity through math and am especially interested in learning more about cryptography and cryptanalysis.  One of my goals is to spread awareness of cybersecurity to a broad audience.  When I am not programming, I enjoy playing the violin and reading.
responsibilities: Lead meetings and delegate tasks to officers

officers.title: Webmaster
officers.name: Chloe Hesskamp
officers.bio: I am a sophomore undergraduate student at CSU studying computer science and mathematics.  I became interested in cybersecurity through math and am especially interested in learning more about cryptography and cryptanalysis.  One of my goals is to spread awareness of cybersecurity to a broad audience.  When I am not programming, I enjoy playing the violin and reading.
responsibilities: Update topic information with urls and notes

officers.title: Sys Admin
officers.name: Britta Maher
officers.bio: I am an undergraduate sophomore majoring in Computer Science at CSU. I participated in many different technology clubs such as Cyber Patriot and the First Tech Challenge during high school, and discovered my interest in cyber security through Cyber Patriot and Girls Go Cyber. I continued my pursuit of cybersecurity by joining Hashdump. I spend a lot of my free time going to hackathons, online conferences, reading or taking care of my plants.
responsibilities: Create educational demos with our systems
Assist and supervise any projects a club member wants to do with our systems

officers.title: Secretary
officers.name: Britta Maher
officers.bio: I am an undergraduate sophomore majoring in Computer Science at CSU. officers.title: Treasurer
officers.name: Enzo Barret
officers.bio: Hello! I'm a sophomore music performance major at CSU (trumpet), soon to be a CS double major. I love all things cyber security and enjoy being a member of this club. Some of by other hobbies include photography, music, and sailing. As treasurer this year I will be adjusting everything in the buget for being virtual!

officers.title: Academic Advisor
officers.name: Dr. Joseph Gersch
officers.bio: Dr. Gersch is an instructor at CSU, the former president of Secure64 Software Corporation, and a 24-year HP veteran. His current research includes systems and network security, blockchain, security analytics, and visualization. As our principle advisor, Dr. Gersch is brimming with knowledge and experience, and is always happy to share it.
